title: Small Mouse/Small Mini Map/ Small Item Shop
body:
So I recently got a new laptop, I have the Asus Q534ux.
SPECS:
Windows 10 Home
Memory: 16 GB DDR4 2133MHz SDRAM, up to 16 GB SDRAM
Processor: Intel® Core™ i7 7500U Processor
Display: 15.6" (16:9) LED backlit UHD (1920x1080) 60Hz Glare Touchscreen with 72% NTSC
Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 950m , with 2GB VRAM

I really want to know how can I change everything so it looks normal. What are the settings I need to change?
My FPS also drops, which is really weird. Any tips or ideas on what I can do so I can use my laptop to its full potential?

replies.body: Hey! Is your problem solved yet? Since I bought the same laptop and I meet the same situation. My friend helps me by downloading intel graphic software last night, and foe dropping problem solved; however it happened again tonight, but fps is not like 3 -10, it is from 30-60. It drives me crazy and I plan to replace it tomorrow.

It sounds like you may have some issues with your driver or display settings inside your driver's software. I'd recommend working through our [FPS guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to ensure your power settings are drivers are all in good standing.

If you still experience issues with this, please grab a screenshot by hitting F12 in-game, then finding the screenshot here:

**(C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Screenshots)**
